itunes:title: Episode 521 - Special Guest Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg
title: Episode 521 - Special Guest Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg from a tavern in Philadelphia to discuss what happened on that fateful day that he was awarded the medal, why sometimes he feels like it's a burden, ho...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg from a tavern in Philadelphia to discuss what happened on that fateful day that he was awarded the medal, why sometimes he feels like it's a burden, how he took heat for speaking at the Democratic National Convention in 2016, and how his life has changed today.

description:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg from a tavern in Philadelphia to discuss what happened on that fateful day that he was awarded the medal, why sometimes he feels like it's a burden, how he took heat for speaking at the Democratic National Convention in 2016, and how his life has changed today.

content:encoded:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with Medal Of Honor Recipient Florent Groberg from a tavern in Philadelphia to discuss what happened on that fateful day that he was awarded the medal, why sometimes he feels like it's a burden, how he took heat for speaking at the Democratic National Convention in 2016, and how his life has changed today.
